entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 3:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 9.6°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
